participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: George is introspective and somewhat reserved, often reflecting on his life experiences.
participant_1.background: my name is george. i've zero family that i am close to. my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Lila is outgoing and passionate about music, always eager to share her love for country and connect with others.
participant_2.background: i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. i grew up in the industry. i started playing guitar when i was three. we spent summers ring at national parks.

content.text: Why are you not speaking with me?
